pkgmetadata.longdescription: Partition/Decomposition of Additive Genetic Values by Paths of Information // Additive genetic (breeding) value represents a sum of additive gene effects over whole genome and can be inferred from phenotype values of relatives via pedigree based mixed models. The partitioning method is described in Garcia- Cortes et al. (2008) DOI:10.1017/S175173110800205X.
